content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good to meet you, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe it would be most suitable for a single person or a small family. As for the rental price, I am open to negotiation, but I am looking for a fair and reasonable fee that will allow me to maximize my gains. What are your thoughts on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay x Euros for the apartment. Can you tell me the current rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. Based on my current market research, I believe that the apartment would be best suited for a rental price of 1,200 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing any potential adjustments to this price based on your specific needs and circumstances. Do you have any questions or concerns about the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand the rental price. I am willing to pay 1,200 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you, Hassan. I am glad that we could come to an agreement on the rental price. In addition to the monthly rental fee, there may be some additional costs associated with the apartment, such as security deposits and utilities. I will provide you with a detailed breakdown of these costs once you have signed the rental agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we proceed with the rental process?
name: Heinrich Heine
